content:
In #13709 I add submodule.map₂, which is like docs#set.image2 but for submodules. It turns out this generalizes docs#submodule.has_mul and docs#submodule.has_scalar', as well as making it easy to take the tensor product of two submodules.

I think all the comments that remain have been postponed to follow-ups by @Junyan Xu/@Junyan Xu|125393.

Could someone take another look?
I would just like to be sure that the API looks similar to the one of set.image2, finset.image₂ and filter.map₂ and that the pointwise API for submodule looks like the set, finset and filter ones.
I'd lean towards doing that in a second pass; this moves a bunch of things around, and is hopefully easier to review if the only change is mul being replaced with map₂ in lemma names
